roleset.name: be too full

example.name: overflow-v: container as subject
example.text: With newspapers being the largest single component of solid waste in our landfills , and with our country overflowing with trash , all sectors of our society and all types of businesses must become more responsible in our use and disposal of precious natural resources .

example.name: ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: The stream water has overflown the riverbanks and flooded into the nearby houses of herders .

roleset.note: OVERFLOW-V NOTES: Sounds better on a larger scale: "The floodwaters overflowed theriver." Even then doesn't sound great, but I know I've encounteredthis construction before. (from overflow.01-v)
